tier_0.greeting: Welcome to the dispensary. How may we assist your wellness today?
tier_0.subtext: You feel an urge to breathe in the sage... it feels right to trust the scent.
tier_0.breach: The herbs don't heal you. They just edit the response to the wound.

tier_2.greeting: Ah, returning for more clarity? Most residents find the third dose is when they finally... stop asking questions.
tier_2.subtext: He isn't looking at you. He is looking at the space where your shadow should be.
tier_2.breach: The Archivist is counting your blinks. Try to stay consistent.

tier_0.greeting: Please present your permit. All history must be verified before viewing.
tier_0.subtext: The weight of the paper in your hand feels like a heavy anchor in a storm.
tier_0.breach: There is no 'past'. There is only the current revision of the logs.
